trends: There have been no other sightings in Wolcott
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside with my two buddies making a donation to the wilderness urination station at about 10:30 p.m., we were admireing how well you could see the stars that night when i saw what looked to be a satilite moving through the night sky, then i realiezed...satillites dont blink, it was blinking and moving pretty quick. It went to a solid color, continued to make a big arc in the sky, slowed down then dissappeared into the darkness of the night. During it both my buddies and i were trying to think what it was, it was blinking then went to a solid color then dissappeared, We were saying that it was way to high to be a plane and way to fast and eratic to be a satilite. After it dissappeared i was chilled to the bone...i didnt know what to think, did we just see a UFO? WEll...we did and still to believe it was a ufo.
Summary: Looked like a fast blinking satillite then it slowed down, made a big arc in the night sky, slowed down, then dissappeared
